# Connecting with Opal data server
## Login to server and assign study data
```{r, echo=FALSE}
#Load Opal R library
library(opal)
library(tidyverse)
library(epiDisplay)
# Create an opal object with the login information
erasmus_opal <- opal.login()
#Login to Opal server and assign the content of the GLOBE table(s) to your RStudio environment
# GLOBE1991
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'GLOBE1991','GLOBE.GLOBE1991', variables = list('v122','v178','SEGVv116','SEVMv333','SEVMv339','SEVMv334','SEVMv335','SEVMv337','SEVMv341','SEVMv347','SEVMv349','SEVMv348','SEVMv360','SEVMv429','SEVMv362','SEVMv352','SEVMv351','v124','v127','SEVMv546','v107','SEGVv107','v177','v213')) 
GLOBE1991 <- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'GLOBE1991')
# GLOBE1997
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'GLOBE1997','GLOBE.GLOBE1997', variables =list('v19','v20','v1','v13h','r22a','r23'))
GLOBE1997 <- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'GLOBE1997')
# GLOBE2004
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'GLOBE2004','GLOBE.GLOBE2004', variables = list('w256','w257','w001','w031')) 
GLOBE2004 <- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'GLOBE2004')
# GLOBE2011
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'GLOBE2011','GLOBE.GLOBE2011', variables = list('v3_gewicht','v4_lengte','v10_alg_gezond')) 
GLOBE2011 <- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'GLOBE2011')
# GLOBE2014
opal.assign.table.tibble(erasmus_opal, 'GLOBE2014','GLOBE.GLOBE2014', variables = list('G14v3','G14v4','G14v13')) 
GLOBE2014 <- opal.execute(erasmus_opal,'GLOBE2014')


```
## Assign participant id as first column of your harmonized dataframes
```{r, echo=FALSE}
oth_GLOBE_0 <- data.frame(id = GLOBE1991$id)
oth_GLOBE_1 <- data.frame(id = GLOBE1997$id)
oth_GLOBE_2 <- data.frame(id = GLOBE2004$id)
oth_GLOBE_3 <- data.frame(id = GLOBE2011$id)
oth_GLOBE_4 <- data.frame(id = GLOBE2014$id)
```
## When you are done with your work, logout of Opal server
```{r, echo=FALSE}
opal.logout(erasmus_opal)
```

# Hypertension subdomain

### **Variable label**: Lifetime occurrence of high blood pressure or hypertension    
**Variable name**: dis_hbp_ever_0  
**Variable description**:  Occurrence of high blood pressure or hypertension at any point during the life of the participant.   
**Value type**:  integer  
**Variable unit**:  N/A  
**Category coding:**  
  
**Code**   | **Category Label**    
-----------| -------------  
0          |  Never had high blood pressure or hypertension  
1          |  Ever had high blood pressure or hypertension  

**Harmonization status**:  complete    
**Harmonization comment**:   medical conditions now or in past 5 years: Hypertension (high blood pressure)  
**R script**:  
```{r, echo=TRUE}
oth_GLOBE_0$dis_hbp_ever_0<-recode(as.integer(GLOBE1991$v178),"1"=0L,"2"=1L,"3"=1L,"8"=1L)

```
